contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 14, 2018 D Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest (Lower Sections)
Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest (Lower Sections) 15 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-bba-entertainment-c-6392
None
Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK For third section, fourth section and unregistered bands.
Music adjudicator: Russell Gray; Entertainment adjudicator: Mareika Gray.
Third section:
Music: 1 Emley 2 Olney 3 Arrow Valley 4 Cherwell
Entertainment: 1 Emley 2 Arrow Valley 3 Olney 4 Oxford Cherwell
Best soloist: Jim Jennings, Bass Trombone, Arrow Valley Brass
Fourth section:
Music: 1 Wantage Academy 2 Witney Town 3 Pangbourne 4 Abbey Brass 5 Marsh Gibbon
Entertainment: 1 Wantage Academy 2 Witney Town 3 Marsh Gibbon 4 Abbey Brass 5 Pangbourne
Best soloist: Eddie Hindson, Euphonium, Wantage Academy
Unregistered section:
Music: 1 Egham Youth 2 Coleshill Youth
Entertainment: 1 Coleshill Youth 2 Egham Youth
Best soloist: Flugel, Coleshill Youth Brass
Best percussion of the day: Michelmersh (1st section) Best tenor horn of the day: Emley Best conductor of the day: Melvin White, Michelmersh (1st section) Best soprano cornet of the day: Olney Best compere of the day: Garry Hallas, Emley Band with most U19 players: Coleshill Youth Brass Youngest player: age 9, Coleshill Youth Brass
Oct. 15, 2018, 9:24 a.m. Oct. 15, 2018, 12:12 p.m.
1 Emley Brass Band Garry Hallas
2 Olney Brass Kevin Nicholls
3 Arrow Valley Brass Andy Culshaw
4 Oxford Cherwell Brass Terry Brotherhood
